mapper.insert: insert into partyBbs(id, title, content, image, wdate, del, readcount, tag, partyType, people, likey, hate, place, mdate, applyMem, endParty, fullParty) values ( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image}, now(), 0, 0, #{tag}, #{partytype}, #{people}, 0, 0, #{place}, #{mdate}, 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update partyBbs set del = 1 where partySeq = #{partySeq}
update partyBbs set title = #{title}, content = #{content},tag=${tag},partytype=#{partytype}, people=#{people}, image=#{image} where partySeq = #{partySeq}
mapper.select: select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, partySeq, id, title, content, image, wdate, del, readcount, tag, partyType, people, likey, hate, place, mdate, applyMem, endParty, fullParty from partyBbs, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r order by wdate desc) a

AND title like concat('%', #{search}, '%') and del =0
